plugin.devicereset.localization.key.name: Reboot, lock, reset
plugin.devicereset.tab.title: Device lock, reboot and factory reset
plugin.devicereset.text.line1: Resetting to factory settings will delete Headwind MDM and cause inability to control the device until it is re-enrolled.
plugin.devicereset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the device "${deviceNumber}" to the factory settings?
plugin.devicereset.reboot.confirm: Are you sure you want to reboot the device "${deviceNumber}"?
plugin.devicereset.lock.confirm: Locking the device will make it impossible to use. Are you sure you want to lock this device?
plugin.devicereset.password.reset.succes: Password reset request has been sent
plugin.devicereset.password.reset: Please enter the new password for the device
plugin.devicereset.lock.message.placehol: Enter the message for the device user
